profile.name: Santiago Pastorino
profile.headline: @wyeworks Senior Software Engineer | Compiler Development & Standard Library Expert
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with a passion for compiler development and standard library optimization. Proficient in Rust systems programming, with experience in compiler team planning documents, meeting minutes, and language design.

experience.title: @wyeworks Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and implemented a new Rust compiler backend for improved performance and efficiency.
Collaborated with the Rust compiler team to optimize standard library vendor-specific APIs for better runtime feature detection.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and maintained multiple open-source projects, including a popular Rust library.
Provided freelance development services to clients in the software industry.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the Rust compiler team, including reviewing and implementing pull requests.
Participated in regular meetings with the team to discuss project progress and plan for future development.

points: Compiler team planning documents, meeting minutes, and language design.
Standard library vendor-specific APIs and runtime feature detection.
